title: MegaAhorros Supermercados
description: A supermarket chain from Ometepe Island. Carries some vegan products like almond milk, vegan oat and soy cookies and soy-milk powder (vegans be aware there are some with lactose added and all have lactose flavor, even the lactose-free ones). Also sold are vegan tortilla bread, bean paste, oats, granola, pasta, rice and many more. Please note the Facebook page is not for this particular location; just gives you a general idea about the chain.
